books.name: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A novel about the American dream, set in the Jazz Age of the 1920s.

books.name: The Alchemist
books.author: Paulo Coelho
books.description: A philosophical novel about following one's dreams, inspired by the author's journey.

books.name: The Pragmatic Programmer
books.author: Andrew Hunt, David Thomas
books.description: A comprehensive guide to becoming a more efficient, effective, and pragmatic software developer.

books.name: Clean Code
books.author: Robert C. Martin
books.description: A must-read for developers who want to write clean, maintainable, and understandable code.

books.name: Sapiens
books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: A compelling history of humankind, exploring the rise of Homo sapiens and our impact on the planet.

books.name: Rich Dad Poor Dad
books.author: Robert T. Kiyosaki
books.description: A personal finance book that contrasts the mindset of the rich and the poor, teaching financial literacy.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian novel about a totalitarian regime that uses surveillance and manipulation to control its citizens.

books.name: Zero to One
books.author: Peter Thiel
books.description: A book about building companies that create new things, focusing on innovation and startup success.

books.name: Hooked
books.author: Nir Eyal
books.description: A guide to creating habit-forming products using behavioral psychology and product design.

books.name: The Lean Startup
books.author: Eric Ries
books.description: A methodology for developing businesses and products through validated learning, experimentation, and innovation.
